title: [With a Flourish]
description: Iron-riveted racks of weaponry are arranged across the ebonwood walls of the shop, the polished hafts and oiled blades glinting in the ambient light above a live-edged display of burled walnut.  Illustrations of various combat techniques frame a leather-covered counter at the center of the room, the branded surface covered with various insignias and coats of arms labeled with parchment placards.  A pair of velvet-lined trunks flank the tall counter, the curved lids decorated in jeweled arabesques.
